body: Refractive index of a material indicates how light would behave when it passes through that material. Since Radiance is a physically based renderer, it's pretty to see this phenomenon in action. The image on the upper right shows a table made of a material with refractive index of 1.5 (typical for glass) while the one below it shows a table made out of air (air has a refractive index of 1). The other two are wood and aluminum. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2RR8Hh9pEHgrOLT8rPOTaFVcIXRNb7M2M45OQCClat8Rr2JJBbS3tR-juYiEg0UI8VVLMMbtXSxYe3h8aKjzUG1IlzUuph2J/1014201522717PM.jpg)
